name: CryptoXchange

attributes.documentation:
*
https://cryptox.market

 *
 * 10 % entry fee
30 % to masternode referrals
0 % transfer fee
Exit fee starts at 50% from contract start
Exit fee decreases over 30 days  until 3%
Stays at 3% forever, thereby allowing short trades.
attributes.name: CryptoXchange

attributes.documentation: @dev Only people with tokens
attributes.name: onlyBagholders

attributes.documentation: @dev Only people with profits
attributes.name: onlyStronghands

attributes.documentation: @dev notGasbag
attributes.name: notGasbag

attributes.documentation: @dev Preventing unstable dumping and limit ambassador mine
attributes.name: antiEarlyWhale

attributes.documentation: @dev notGasbag
attributes.name: isControlled

attributes.documentation: @dev Converts all incoming ethereum to tokens for the caller, and passes down the referral addy (if any)
attributes.name: buy

attributes.documentation: @dev Converts to tokens on behalf of the customer - this allows gifting and integration with other systems
attributes.name: buyFor

attributes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function to handle ethereum that was sent straight to the contract
 Unfortunately we cannot use a referral address this way.
@dev Converts all of caller's dividends to tokens.
attributes.name: reinvest

attributes.documentation: @dev Alias of sell() and withdraw().
attributes.name: exit

attributes.documentation: @dev Withdraws all of the callers earnings.
attributes.name: withdraw

attributes.documentation: @dev Liquifies tokens to ethereum.
attributes.name: sell

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfer tokens from the caller to a new holder.
attributes.name: transfer

attributes.documentation:
@dev Method to view the current Ethereum stored in the contract
 Example: totalEthereumBalance()
attributes.name: totalEthereumBalance

attributes.documentation: @dev Retrieve the total token supply.
attributes.name: totalSupply

attributes.documentation: @dev Retrieve the tokens owned by the caller.
attributes.name: myTokens

attributes.documentation:
@dev Retrieve the dividends owned by the caller.
 If `_includeReferralBonus` is to to 1/true, the referral bonus will be included in the calculations.
 The reason for this, is that in the frontend, we will want to get the total divs (global + ref)
 But in the internal calculations, we want them separate.
attributes.name: myDividends

attributes.documentation: @dev Retrieve the token balance of any single address.
attributes.name: balanceOf

attributes.documentation: @dev Retrieve the dividend balance of any single address.
attributes.name: dividendsOf

attributes.documentation: @dev Return the sell price of 1 individual token.
attributes.name: sellPrice

attributes.documentation: @dev Return the buy price of 1 individual token.
attributes.name: buyPrice

attributes.documentation: @dev Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of buy orders.
attributes.name: calculateTokensReceived

attributes.documentation: @dev Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of sell orders.
attributes.name: calculateEthereumReceived

attributes.documentation: @dev Function for the frontend to get untaxed receivable ethereum.
attributes.name: calculateUntaxedEthereumReceived

attributes.documentation: @dev Function for getting the current exitFee
attributes.name: exitFee

attributes.documentation: @dev Internal function to actually purchase the tokens.
attributes.name: purchaseTokens

tokensToEthereum_

attributes.documentation: @dev This is where all your gas goes.

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
